name: Speck
headline: Paige, an AI Frontend Engineer
description:
We're the makers of Paige. Paige is an AI frontend engineer that helps developers iterate faster on websites. Our customers use us to save hours on slow frontend development.

Lucas built Sweep, an AI developer. Raghav won 9 hackathons with LLM agents.
‎
Join our community: https://discord.gg/speck
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:b2b; industry:web-development; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Lucas Jaggernauth, Founder
founders.description:
Ex-Roblox engineer. Founding Engineer of Sweep (YC S23), an AI junior developer with 7k GitHub stars. At Roblox, I built multilingual autocomplete for 160 million users. I was a computer vision researcher for the BRIAR government project.

Graduated Summa Cumme Laude from UT Dallas with a double major in CS and cognitive science.

founders.name: Raghav Pillai, Founder
founders.description:
Previously engineering @ Anduril and Amazon. Built out telemetry, realtime video and software orchestration for Anduril, and worked on consumer robotics at Amazon. Worked on software for autonomous vehicle research. Hackathon addict, 10x winner. 

https://raghav.sh/
https://github.com/raghavpillai

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Speck

**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** San Francisco  
**Batch:** Y Combinator W24  
**Team Size:** 2  
**Partner:** Diana Hu  

### Mission Statement
Speck is all about making frontend development faster and more efficient through its innovative product, Paige. Essentially, Paige is an AI-powered frontend engineer designed to help developers iterate more quickly on their websites, significantly cutting down the hours usually spent on frontend tasks.

### Product Offering
**Paige** — your new AI frontend engineer companion. Here’s how Paige simplifies web development:
1. **Connect to GitHub:** You can link Paige to your existing repositories or let her create new projects.
2. **Instruct Paige:** Just tell her what you need using natural language—add images, links, and API requests for context.
3. **Iterate Results:** Work with Paige to hone in on specific outcomes, with her presenting beautiful results right out of the box.
4. **Push Changes:** Paige crafts pull requests for review, making it easy to integrate changes into your codebase.

This entire process allows developers to build websites at lightning speed and with minimal effort.

### Key Features
- **Flexible Integration:** Paige supports a variety of frameworks and libraries, including React and its ecosystems like Next.js and Gatsby.
- **Early Access Pricing:** Currently available for early adopters at $80 a month.
- **Background Operation:** Paige works independently in a sandbox environment, ensuring you don’t waste time waiting around.
  
### The Team's Background
The founders bring impressive credentials to the table: Lucas developed Sweep, an AI developer, while Raghav has a track record of winning nine hackathons with LLM (Large Language Model) agents. Together, they represent a strong technical foundation for Speck's mission.

### Community Engagement
Speck invites developers to join their evolving community via [Discord](https://discord.gg/speck) to share insights, ask questions, and collaborate.

### Website and Resources
You can learn more about Paige and get started with your web development journey at [paige.sh](https://paige.sh).

In a nutshell, Speck is leveraging AI to redefine how we think about frontend development, enabling developers to create and iterate at unprecedented speeds. If you’re in the web development space, this could be the game-changer you didn’t know you were missing.
